setContents.fact: Hydrogen and oxygen combine to form water
setContents.explanation: Water (H2O) is made of two hydrogen atoms and one oxygen atom.

setContents.fact: Carbon has six protons in its nucleus
setContents.explanation: Carbon has an atomic number of 6.
Sodium is a silvery-white, highly reactive alkali metal.

setContents.fact: Nitrogen is the most abundant gas in the atmosphere
setContents.explanation: Nitrogen makes up about 75% of the atmosphere's mass.
Sulfuric acid is a strong acid and can cause severe chemical burns.
Argon is in group 18 of the periodic table and is chemically inert under most conditions.
